summary: This code is executing four Python scripts sequentially, named makeDB0.py through makeDB3.py. Each script likely creates or modifies a database component. The bash script ensures that the Python scripts are executed in order.

details.comment: This code is executing four Python scripts sequentially, named makeDB0.py through makeDB3.py. Each script likely creates or modifies a database component. The bash script ensures that the Python scripts are executed in order.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
python3 makeDB0.py
python3 makeDB1.py
python3 makeDB2.py
python3 makeDB3.py
